unittitle_ssm: C.I. Taylor Letter from Albacete, Spain
abstract_ssm: C.I. Taylor was an American volunteer who served in the Spanish Civil War (1936-1939). The letter in the collection describes his experience as a machine gunner in the Tom Mooney Company and his time spent at the headquarters in Albacete, Spain.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
